import { colors, spacing, shadows } from '@/components/tokens' import Demo from '@/utils/components/Demo' import Text from '@/components/Text' # Colors --- #### Atomic colors following the styleguide. ```jsx // How to use colors import { colors } from '@occmundial/atomic/tokens' // Destructuring the colors object const { sec } = colors function Component() { return ( <>
) } ``` ## Examples ### Colors {/* Primary */}
Lighter colors.primLighter #e4edff
Light colors.primLight #c8d9ff
Primary colors.prim #083cae
Dark colors.primDark #002b99
Darker colors.primDarker #001d7c
{/* Secondary */}
Lighter colors.secLighter #feeff3
Light colors.secLight #fa90ac
Secondary colors.sec #f13465
Dark colors.secDark #cc1b4a
Darker colors.secDarker #990932
{/* Ink */}
Lightest colors.inkLightest #dddddd
Lighter colors.inkLighter #aaaaaa
Light colors.inkLight #777777
Ink colors.ink #222222
{/* White */}
White colors.white #ffffff
Grey colors.bgGrey #f5f5f8
{/* Grey */}
50 colors.grey50 #fafafa
100 colors.grey100 #f5f5f5
200 colors.grey200 #dddddd
300 colors.grey300 #cccccc
400 colors.grey400 #aaaaaa
500 colors.grey500 #999999
600 colors.grey600 #777777
700 colors.grey700 #666666
800 colors.grey800 #444444
900 colors.grey900 #222222
{/* Link */}
Text Link colors.textLink #0946CB
{/* Info*/}
Info colors.info #5736ab
Info Light colors.infoLight #efebf7
Info Text colors.infoText #5736ab
{/* Warning*/}
Warnign colors.warning #ffc549
Warning Light colors.warningLight #fffaed
Warnign Text colors.warningText #e69000
{/* Success*/}
Success colors.success #009537
Success Light colors.successLight #e6f5eb
Success Text colors.successText #009537
{/* Error */}
Error colors.error #db3737
Error Light colors.errorLight #fcebeb
Error Text colors.errorText #db3737
{/* Others */}
Brand colors.brand #0046ff
BG White colors.bgWhite #ffffff
